channel.title: The MakerForce Show
channel.description: A monthly podcast by a group of young hackers talking about engineering, software development and tech.
channel.itunes:summary: A monthly podcast by a group of young hackers talking about engineering, software development and tech.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A monthly podcast by a group of young hackers talking about engineering, software development and tech.
channel.itunes:author: MakerForce

item.title: #1: The Beginning of the End
item.description: We go thorugh our experience at IDEA Hacks, and then mention Android's market share, last week's MacBook release, USB Type-C, touch, X, chips angled at not 45°, self-driving, electric cars and public transport.
item.content:encoded:
Trump just won. We go thorugh our experience at IDEA Hacks, and then mention Android’s market share, last week’s MacBook release, USB Type-C, touch, X, chips angled at not 45°, self-driving, electric cars and public transport.

  • Android hits market share record
  • Android One
  • Apple is now a dongle company
  • Starbucks and Alphabet
  • OpenCV
  • wit.ai
  • IBM Bluemix & Watson
  • X
  • Soli, Myo
  • Sudharshan’s new station
  • Orange Pi PC 2

Intro music: ZigZag by KevinMacLeod
item.author: MakerForce
item.itunes:author: MakerForce
item.itunes:subtitle: We go thorugh our experience at IDEA Hacks, and then mention Android's market share, last week's MacBook release, USB Type-C, touch, X, chips angled at not 45°, self-driving, electric cars and public transport.

item.title: #0: try {} catch (e) {}
item.description: We start off the podcast with a quick overview on MakerForce and each of us, then talk about the Google announcement, Arduino merger and Note 7 recall.
item.content:encoded:
In this (less technical) episode, we start off the podcast with a quick overview on MakerForce and each of us, then talk about the Google announcement, Arduino merger and Note 7 recall.

  • Made by Google
  • Google Home vs Amazon Echo
  • Arduino merger
  • commongoods

Intro music: ZigZag by KevinMacLeod

Tweet at us!
item.author: MakerForce
